description: LiveAgent is the most reviewed and #1 rated help desk software for SMB in 2017. Stay closer to your customers and answer their questions faster with LiveAgent.
steps: Navigate in the admin panel, while logged in as an admin, to the following location: Configuration > System > API and wait there a few seconds and an API key is going to be generated for you

args.name: page
args.info: Page to display. Not used if from is defined.

args.name: perPage
args.info: Results per page. Used only if page is used.

args.name: from
args.info: Result set start. Takes precedence over page.

args.name: to
args.info: Result set end. Used only if _from is used.

blocks.name: addCall
blocks.description: Creates new call (ingoing / outcoming / internal). Does not initiate the outgoing call

args.name: viaNumber
args.info: Trunk number via which call was made / received

args.name: direction
args.info: Incoming call ('in' - default), outgoing call ('out') or internal call('int')

blocks.name: answerCall
blocks.description: Set call as answered by agent

blocks.name: mergeCalls
blocks.description: Merge secondary call into main call

args.name: agentId
args.info: Agent ID for removing from the call

blocks.name: rerouteCall
blocks.description: Lets the call ring to an another agent if available

blocks.name: ringCall
blocks.description: Lets the call ring to an another agent if available

blocks.name: addMessageToCall
blocks.description: Adds a message to the call group in corresponfing ticket

args.name: type
args.info: T (text), H (html), A (audio - url to audio file or fileId), S (system), N (note), NF (note file)

args.info: Page to display. Not used if from is defined.
